OOC:   At least some of the falme should have stuck to Void and why is 
he the only one fighting?

BIC:  The acid hits Thirst's chest.  He ejects some of his armor 
before it can eat through.  He fires 4 plasma blasts POINT BLANK RANGE 
at Void.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> As the flames surrounded Void all they did was burn off his cloak, 
revealing 
> the being that looks more like some blood red demon, its scales 
glistening 
> with bits of metal and organic matter. Void laughs as two red and 
green wings 
> sprout from his back. In an instant the wings fold infront of him 
and then 
> seemigly split and reform themselves into a new cloak. Quickly void 
lunges at 
> and grabs the robot as a cloud of corrosive acid and gas encompasses 
the 
> robot and the area around it that eats away at his armor and super 
structure.
